pageContext.claim: “Today, we follow through on this recognition and open our embassy in the historic and sacred land of Jerusalem, and we're opening it many many years ahead of schedule.”
pageContext.analysis: The U.S. embassy in Jerusalem opened one year ahead of the 2019 target date Vice President Mike Pence had set in a speech to the Knesset, not "many many years ahead." Furthermore, it's not a permanent location.
